name: OSOM STUDIO
tagline: Wordpress experts ready to help you
description:
We support your brand in the online world.
We offer comprehensive services to shape the online image of your company. If you need Wordpress/WooCommerce developers, we are the best choice.
We also develop brand strategies and marketing concepts, design websites and mobile applications, produce videos, and implement advertising campaigns - everything to make your brand more recognizable on the web and to increase your profits.
We have proven track record of executing difficult projects with successful outcomes. 
Our agency was awarded with 4 Honorable Mentions from Awwwards.com, multiple recognitions from CSSDesignAwards.com and Brazowy Spinacz for Eurobank CSR campaign.
